name: golden_05_teleport_wand
prompt: create a teleportation wand that teleports me forward when I click

verify.code: () => { const items = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.itemFactory.itemTypes; const wand = Object.values(items).find(i => i.name.toLowerCase().includes('teleport')); return wand ? { success: true } : { success: false, message: 'No teleport wand found' }; }
